member.summary: Stops the animation, updates the keyframes and starts the animation

member.summary: Obtains the keyframes for each animation in the storyboard so that they can be updated when required.

member.summary: Gets the keyframes in the given animation and stores them in a map
member.param: Flag to indicate whether the animation targets the opacity or the translate transform

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.UpdateKeyFrames
member.summary: Update the key value of each keyframe based on the current width of the FluidProgressBar

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.UpdateKeyFrame(System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Update the key value of the keyframes stored in the map
member.param: New value to be given to the key value of the keyframes

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.UpdateKeyTimes(System.Int32,System.Windows.Duration)
member.summary: Updates the duration of each of the keyframes stored in the map

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.UpdateKeyTime(System.Int32,System.Windows.Duration)
member.summary: Updates the duration of each of the keyframes stored in the map
member.param: New value to be given to the duration value of the keyframes

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.UpdateOpacityKeyTime(System.Int32,System.Windows.Duration)
member.summary: Updates the duration of the second keyframe of all the opacity animations
member.param: New value to be given to the duration value of the keyframes

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.UpdateTimelineDelay(System.Windows.Duration)
member.summary: Updates the delay between consecutive timelines

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by an instance of the FluidProgressBar class.
member.remarks: This method calls the virtual Dispose(bool) method, passing in 'true', and then suppresses finalization of the instance.

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.Finalize
member.summary: Releases unmanaged resources before an instance of the FluidProgressBar class is reclaimed by garbage collection.
member.remarks: NOTE: Leave out the finalizer altogether if this class doesn't own unmanaged resources itself, but leave the other methods exactly as they are. This method releases unmanaged resources by calling the virtual Dispose(bool), passing in 'false'.

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by an instance of the FluidProgressBar class and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: 'true' to release both managed and unmanaged resources; 'false' to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.InitializeComponent
member.summary: InitializeComponent

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.Delay
member.summary: Gets or sets the Delay property. This dependency property indicates the delay between adjacent animation timelines.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.DotWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the DotWidth property. This dependency property indicates the width of each of the dots.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.DotHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the DotHeight property. This dependency property indicates the height of each of the dots.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.DotRadiusX
member.summary: Gets or sets the DotRadiusX property. This dependency property indicates the corner radius width of each of the dot.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.DotRadiusY
member.summary: Gets or sets the DotRadiusY property. This dependency property indicates the corner height of each of the dots.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.DurationA
member.summary: Gets or sets the DurationA property. This dependency property indicates the duration of the animation from the start point till KeyFrameA.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.DurationB
member.summary: Gets or sets the DurationB property. This dependency property indicates the duration of the animation from the KeyFrameA till KeyFrameB.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.DurationC
member.summary: Gets or sets the DurationC property. This dependency property indicates the duration of the animation from KeyFrameB till the end point.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.KeyFrameA
member.summary: Gets or sets the KeyFrameA property. This dependency property indicates the first KeyFrame position after the initial keyframe.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.KeyFrameB
member.summary: Gets or sets the KeyFrameB property. This dependency property indicates the second KeyFrame position after the initial keyframe.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.Oscillate
member.summary: Gets or sets the Oscillate property. This dependency property indicates whether the animation should oscillate.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.ReverseDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the ReverseDuration property. This dependency property indicates the duration of the total animation in reverse.

member.name: P:WPFSpark.FluidProgressBar.TotalDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the TotalDuration property. This dependency property indicates the duration of the complete animation.

member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Orchestra.OrchestraException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: P:Orchestra.Markup.CanvasViewbox.Foreground
member.summary:
Gets or sets the foreground. If the foreground is (default value), it will respect the colors of the canvas.
If this property has a different value, this markup extension will overwrite all the fill colors of the canvas paths.
